replies.body:
WE STAND UNITED 

TOGETHER WE ARE STRONGER

NONE SHALL BREAK OUR SHIELD

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
We don't need to break the shield to break the man.
We will take over{{sticker:sg-syndra}}
{{sticker:sg-syndra}} **WARBAND STRONG!** {{sticker:sg-kiko}}
~United, we stand~
your sheild has been broken
THE COUNCIL ARE NO LONGER LAST! WE MOVING UP IN THE WORLD!
THE LATEGAME PLAY

Oi oi oi what the hell happened? Purple gang WAKE YOUR ASSES UP!!! Them greens caught us sleepin and now we got hell to pay for it. Hustle is the name of the game now so GET MOVING!!!!!  {{summoner:12}} PURPLE GANG #1! {{summoner:12}}
WE are Warband, they can win the battles but we'll win the war{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I'm so sad i picked 
The Faceless
Right? Awesome look; I love the quirky off meta stuff (atm my favorite is Rek'Sai support). Unfortunately... not such a popular house apparently.
No we just actually do something different. We want to win in a unique way.
UNITED WE STAND! GREEN TEAM FOR LIFE! {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

Lets go **WARBAND**! **STEP UP YOUR GAME**! This is the week that matters most! Don't forget what you represent **WARBAND**! Lets go **WARBAND**!
{{sticker:sg-kiko}} {{sticker:sg-shisa}}
Ironic that the house that is known for making comebacks is the one that has been consistently in the lead.
{{sticker:darius-angry}} C'MON WARBAND LET GET THIS BREAD
As Faceless Singed main I hope we stay in dead last lmao. Just keep fucking around and spam your emotes!
Crittlesticks Mid!
honestly couldn't be prouder. top lane lulu forever
I also play top lane lulu lmao. With Electrocute!
I play Toplane ElectroLulu too! :)
hail of blades bard
Mm, I love the House Coucil :PPP
LETS GO UNITED ONE MORE WEEK OF GRINDING TO GO!! We got this together!

IMAGINE HAVING TO WAIT FOR THE ENEMY TO THROW SO YOU CAN WIN


MADE BY PENTAKILL WARBAND GANG
Council is making our move!  Galaxy brain playing for the late game!
oof faceless is garbage {{item:3070}}
UNITED WE STAND

Thats really great for united for winning so far but we ALL know that United does NOT represent the League of Legends community. There's either a bunch of players having an identity crisis or a lot of them are just lying to themselves. Love the United mindset, just not realistic for the community. But still, go Council! Congrats so far united!

The Faceless Trolls are actually winning, but Rito will never admit that!

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
w-we didnt wanna win anyways {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

I really hope they give out stats for this event. Usually team events go to whichever one looks cooler and the United is definitely not the best looking banner (or even color). Even though i picked united im still surprised we are turning out
i joined faceless {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
I got in faceless for Faker! Faker all the way :)
Its okay faceless guys we hiding for the ultimate sneaky play for that big come back{{sticker:sg-syndra}}
I picked faceless because it sounded cool as shit. I was supposed to be in United. I am so sad. {{sticker:sg-ahri-3}}
Ah yes, my favorite house, the _Coucil_
why no new missions yet guys?
all of my friends join faceless lmao
I joined Warband because it had the coolest looking icon. Go Warband{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
no
And other fun jokes you can tell yourself
There is no way council has more people in it than faceless. Feels kinda rigged. Anyway warbands are the best, let’s go.
The amount of people in a certain house doesn't matter. It's how many missions they have completed that matters.
The Faceless legit rage quit LMAO
